How I Help SMBs Achieve Breakthrough Results

Real-world examples of transforming marketing challenges into competitive advantages

Brand Transformation: Breaking Through Competitive Noise

How a $250MM Brand Achieved 4x Category Growth

Challenge: Established lawn care brand struggling with commoditization, declining margins, and fierce competition.

Strategy: Complete brand transformation including new positioning, innovation pipeline, visual identity, and omnichannel marketing approach.

Results: 8.2% growth (4x faster than category), 98.8% EBIT improvement, and sustainable competitive differentiation.

SMB Application: This same systematic approach to brand transformation works for businesses of any size - it's about strategy and execution, not budget.

Strategic Partnerships: Unlocking Major Growth Opportunities

$7MM Incremental Revenue Through Retailer Optimization

Challenge: Underperforming relationship with major retailer despite strong product-market fit.

Innovation: Developed comprehensive retailer-specific strategy including assortment optimization, pricing strategy, and co-marketing initiatives.

Results: $7MM incremental revenue, expanded shelf presence, and template for scaling to additional retailers.

SMB Application: Strategic partnership development and retailer/channel optimization creates outsized growth opportunities for growing businesses.

Creative Excellence: Award-Winning Campaigns That Drive Results

#FlipTheTurf: 3.95B Impressions, 2 Clio Awards

Challenge: Breaking through crowded sports marketing landscape with limited budget compared to major competitors.

Innovation: Created authentic storytelling campaign that connected brand values with cultural moments, maximizing earned media.

Results: 3.95 billion media impressions, 2 Clio Sports Awards, significant brand awareness lift, and cost-per-impression 60% below industry average.

SMB Application: Smart creative strategy and cultural relevance can level the playing field against much larger competitors with bigger budgets.

Flexible Engagement Models Designed for Growing Businesses

Choose the level of strategic support that fits your needs and budget

Fractional CMO

Ongoing strategic marketing leadership for businesses ready to scale. I become your part-time CMO, providing strategic direction, team leadership, and hands-on execution support.

  • Strategic planning and execution oversight
  • Marketing team development and leadership
  • Board-level marketing reporting and insights
  • Ongoing optimization and performance management

Ideal for: Businesses ($10M-$100M) needing consistent marketing leadership without full-time CMO overhead

Project-Based Transformations

Focused, time-bound projects that transform specific aspects of your marketing. Perfect for businesses with clear objectives and defined timelines.

  • Complete brand transformation and repositioning
  • Digital marketing transformation and MarTech implementation
  • Innovation pipeline development and product launch
  • Marketing operations optimization and process design

Ideal for: Businesses needing specific marketing transformations with clear deliverables and timelines

Marketing Strategy Consulting

Strategic guidance and framework development for businesses that want to maintain internal execution while getting expert direction on complex marketing challenges.

  • Marketing strategy development and planning
  • Go-to-market strategy for new products/services
  • Competitive analysis and market positioning
  • Marketing performance assessment and optimization

Ideal for: Businesses with strong internal teams needing strategic direction and expert guidance

Team Training & Capability Building

Upskill your existing marketing team with enterprise-level knowledge and frameworks. Build internal capabilities while getting immediate impact.

  • Marketing fundamentals and strategic thinking workshops
  • Brand management and positioning training
  • Performance marketing and analytics development
  • Marketing leadership and cross-functional collaboration

Ideal for: Businesses wanting to develop internal marketing capabilities and team skills

Interim Leadership

Immediate marketing leadership during transitions, restructuring, or while searching for permanent marketing hires. Maintain momentum and drive results during change.

  • Immediate marketing leadership and decision-making
  • Team stabilization and motivation during transition
  • Strategic continuity and execution oversight
  • Recruitment support for permanent marketing roles

Ideal for: Businesses experiencing marketing leadership transitions or organizational change
